snippet: Just how did ISIS spread so far, so fast? The National Arboretum might have the answer.
abstract: Thomas L Friedman Op-Ed column highlights degree to which Islamic State group operates just like an invasive species; contends it is important to understand that group consists of coalition of foreign fighters that is relying on Western military action to drive non-ISIS Sunnis away from America and closer to the group.
lead_paragraph: Just how did ISIS spread so far, so fast? The National Arboretum might have the answer.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
